other_title: Hakuoki ~Demon of the Fleeting Blossom~ A Memory of Snow Flowers
opening_theme: "Yume no Ukifune (夢ノ浮舟)" by Aika Yoshioka
ending_theme: #1: "Mugen - a true love tale- (夢幻 -a true love tale-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 1)
#2: "Kazahana -The whisper of snow falling- (風花 -The whisper of snow falling-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 2)
#3: "Ran -The end of struggle- (蘭 -The end of struggle-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 3)
#4: "Hikari -I promise you- (光 -I promise you-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 4)
#5: "Shinjitsu -The light lasting- (真実 -The light lasting-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 5)
#6: "Hiyoku -Contract with you- (比翼-Contract with you-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 6)
